item.title: Introducing collapse: Advanced and Fast Data Transformation in R
item.description: Introduction collapse is a C/C++ based package for data transformation and statistical computing in R. It was first released on CRAN end of March 2020. The current version 1.3.1 is a mature package secured by > 7700 unit tests. collapse has 2 main aims: To facilitate complex data transformation, exploration and computing tasks in R. (In particular grouped and weighted statistical computations, advanced aggregation of multi-type data, advanced transformations of time series and panel data, and the manipulation of lists)
